newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICA'S VAAL, BLOEMHOF DAMS LEVELS STILL RISING.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA'S VAAL, BLOEMHOF DAMS LEVELS STILL RISING.

text.p: South African Water and Forestry officials on Friday repeated advice to residents of low lying areas around the Vaal and Bloemhof dams to exercise caution as water levels triggered by unseasonal rains continued to rise.
They said the Vaal Dam was currently 118.6 percent full and its water level is not expected to change until Sunday.
It said the current capacity of the Bloemhof Dam was at 114 percent and is expected to increase to 119 percent on Sunday.
